Summary: Very bright light, hovering disc then moved slowly off
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to work at about 5:15 and noticed a stationary very bright light up the road in a pasture. Two cars were ahead of me, and neither slowed down but I saw it just hovering in a pasture. I stopped my car and got out, and it started moving away with a swooshing noise. It was disc shaped, with multi colored lights circling it. I was not frightened at all as I know that there are many entities watching over us and are getting ready for us to ascend.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pine Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
